author: Matt Haig
review: Educated is a searing memoir of resilience and transformation, following Tara Westover as she escapes her isolated survivalist upbringing in rural Idaho and embarks on an academic journey culminating in a PhD from Cambridge University. Her narrative is marked by vivid storytelling, emotional honesty, and profound insights into family, identity, and the power of education to reshape life paths.
